wordGroup: rye flour 黑麦粉；裸麦粉

sentences.en: Rye is tolerant of poor, acid soils.
sentences.cn: 黑麦耐贫瘠的酸性土壤。

sentences.en: I was eating ham and Swiss cheese on rye.
sentences.cn: 我当时正在吃夹火腿和瑞士乳酪的黑麦面包。

sentences.en: One of the first crops that I grew when we came here was rye.
sentences.cn: 我们来到这里时，我种的第一批作物中就有黑麦。
